phrs.translation: 保管员和馆长, 管理员, 监护人
博物馆技术人员和文物保护

sentences.sentence: The conservators had to act quickly because canvases, like people, “have a memory, ” she explained.
sentences.translation: 修复员的动作要快，她解释说，因为画布就像人一样“有记忆”。

sentences.sentence: Mr. Bull and several other conservators who have not seen the tear say the next steps depend on many unanswered questions.
sentences.translation: 布尔先生和其他几位同样没有见到撕裂状况的保护工作者都表示，下一步工作取决于许多未回答的问题。

sentences.sentence: It urged Philippine conservators to set up or expand Marine protected areas and curb plastic rubbish that litters the ocean floor.
sentences.translation: 声明敦促菲律宾管理者建立或扩展海洋保护区，并控制塑料垃圾对海底的污染。
